text: Via Roma is an important street of Palermo. It represents one of the main axes of the historic centre and connect the Palermo Centrale railway station to the Teatro Politeama. Several important buildings of the city appears along the street's path. Via Roma was designed with the 1885 Master Plan of Palermo (the so-called "Piano Giarrusso")La strada del futuro che chiuse un'epoca, La Repubblica, November 26, 2008Le vie di Palermo: Via Roma - siciliaterradelsole.com and built between 1894 and 1936. == Places of interest == * Vucciria * Piazza San Domenico * Church of San Domenico * Church of Sant'Antonio Abate * Anglican Church of the Holy Cross * Palazzo delle Poste * Palazzo delle Ferrovie * Teatro Biondo == References == == Books == * Chirco A., Di Liberto M., Via Roma: la strada nuova del Novecento, Flaccovio, 2008 Roma
title: Via Roma, Palermo
